Method Detail

open

public Scan open()
The method first sorts its two underlying scans on their join field. It then returns a mergejoin scan of the two sorted table scans.

Specified by:
open in interface Plan
Overrides:
open in class MergeJoinPlan
Returns:
a scan
See Also:
Plan.open()

saveSorts

public void saveSorts(TableInfo tbi,
                      Transaction tx,
                      Scan s)
This saves the temporary sorted table over the base table so it maintains the sorting.

Parameters:
tbi - the TableInfo about the base table that was sorted
tx - the current Transaction
s - the temporary sorted table iterator
